Array.name: Moai Statue
Array.description: A stone statue known for sculpting the face of a god. Somehow, looking into its shadowed eyes strengthens the spirit.
Array.parchmentDescription: A stone statue known for sculpting the face of a god. Somehow, looking into its shadowed eyes strengthens the spirit.
Array.clue: A stone statue known for sculpting the face of a god. Somehow, looking into its shadowed eyes strengthens the spirit.

Array.name: Thinking Rabbit
Array.description: A statue carved in the likeness of the sage Totur, who was deeply concerned about the fate of the rabbits. It embodies the worry for the rabbits left in the world abandoned by the gods.
Array.parchmentDescription: A statue carved in the likeness of the sage Totur, who was deeply concerned about the fate of the rabbits. It embodies the worry for the rabbits left in the world abandoned by the gods.
Array.clue: A statue carved in the likeness of the sage Totur, who was deeply concerned about the fate of the rabbits. It embodies the worry for the rabbits left in the world abandoned by the gods.

Array.name: Discus Thrower
Array.description: A bronze statue made to commemorate the competition held during the past Opion festival. The sports enjoyed by those who couldn't use magic are realistically depicted.
Array.parchmentDescription: A bronze statue made to commemorate the competition held during the past Opion festival. The sports enjoyed by those who couldn't use magic are realistically depicted.
Array.clue: A bronze statue made to commemorate the competition held during the past Opion festival. The sports enjoyed by those who couldn't use magic are realistically depicted.

Array.name: Pillar of the Ancient Temple
Array.description: A fragment of the temple pillar of the God of the Sun, Sol. It's part of the temple that was destroyed by the king of Lukuma, 'Erako'.
Array.parchmentDescription: A fragment of the temple pillar of the God of the Sun, Sol. It's part of the temple that was destroyed by the king of Lukuma, 'Erako'.
Array.clue: A fragment of the temple pillar of the God of the Sun, Sol. It's part of the temple that was destroyed by the king of Lukuma, 'Erako'.

Array.name: Fresco Piece from a Crumbled Tomb
Array.description: A mural piece with hieroglyphics found in the tomb of King Pityr (Pira). It depicts the longing of Nener II for his child and queen, who lost their lives in a disaster.
Array.parchmentDescription: A mural piece with hieroglyphics found in the tomb of King Pityr (Pira). It depicts the longing of Nener II for his child and queen, who lost their lives in a disaster.
Array.clue: A mural piece with hieroglyphics found in the tomb of King Pityr (Pira). It depicts the longing of Nener II for his child and queen, who lost their lives in a disaster.

Array.name: Rosetta Stone
Array.description: A stone inscribed with alchemical symbols interpreted in Pira's way. The phrase "The first alchemy originated from the lack of love" is written on it.
Array.parchmentDescription: A stone inscribed with alchemical symbols interpreted in Pira's way. The phrase "The first alchemy originated from the lack of love" is written on it.
Array.clue: A stone inscribed with alchemical symbols interpreted in Pira's way. The phrase "The first alchemy originated from the lack of love" is written on it.

Array.name: Giant Feather Fan
Array.description: A fan used by those who served the gods. It has abundant feathers attached to a rod longer than a person's height.
Array.parchmentDescription: A fan used by those who served the gods. It has abundant feathers attached to a rod longer than a person's height.
Array.clue: A fan used by those who served the gods. It has abundant feathers attached to a rod longer than a person's height.

Array.name: Topid Statue
Array.description: A statue inspired by the messenger of love. It's depicted holding a bow and arrow, a gift from a playful god who loved people's stories.
Array.parchmentDescription: A statue inspired by the messenger of love. It's depicted holding a bow and arrow, a gift from a playful god who loved people's stories.
Array.clue: A statue inspired by the messenger of love. It's depicted holding a bow and arrow, a gift from a playful god who loved people's stories.

Array.name: Golden Footprints
Array.description: A large footprint imprinted on a golden tile. It's claimed to be a mark left by the God of the Sun, but it's said that the truth of that is unknowable.
Array.parchmentDescription: A large footprint imprinted on a golden tile. It's claimed to be a mark left by the God of the Sun, but it's said that the truth of that is unknowable.
Array.clue: A large footprint imprinted on a golden tile. It's claimed to be a mark left by the God of the Sun, but it's said that the truth of that is unknowable.

Array.name: National Foundation Commemorative Coin
Array.description: A coin commemorating the founding of Lukuma. In order to declare that it follows in the footsteps of Opion, the face of 'Purta I', the founding emperor of Opion, is engraved on the front, and 'Kalitoani', the first king of Lukuma, on the back.
Array.parchmentDescription: A coin commemorating the founding of Lukuma. In order to declare that it follows in the footsteps of Opion, the face of 'Purta I', the founding emperor of Opion, is engraved on the front, and 'Kalitoani', the first king of Lukuma, on the back.
Array.clue: A coin commemorating the founding of Lukuma. In order to declare that it follows in the footsteps of Opion, the face of 'Purta I', the founding emperor of Opion, is engraved on the front, and 'Kalitoani', the first king of Lukuma, on the back.

Array.name: Sunflower Without the Sun
Array.description: A painting drawn in longing for the gods who left the world after the divine punishment. It captures the desolate wilting of a sunflower, symbolizing humanity's feelings towards Sol, the God of the Sun who created and punished the world.
Array.parchmentDescription: A painting drawn in longing for the gods who left the world after the divine punishment. It captures the desolate wilting of a sunflower, symbolizing humanity's feelings towards Sol, the God of the Sun who created and punished the world.
Array.clue: A painting drawn in longing for the gods who left the world after the divine punishment. It captures the desolate wilting of a sunflower, symbolizing humanity's feelings towards Sol, the God of the Sun who created and punished the world.

Array.name: Portrait of a Couple
Array.description: A painting from an age when gods walked among people. It signifies the existence of different races living in unity.
Array.parchmentDescription: A painting from an age when gods walked among people. It signifies the existence of different races living in unity.
Array.clue: A painting from an age when gods walked among people. It signifies the existence of different races living in unity.

Array.name: Collapsed Tower of Babel
Array.description: A desperate prayer reached the gods. At the time when the moon set and the sun began to rise, the divine judgment soared above the clouds, shattering the tower of "Babel" where it stood, and fell upon the castle where the Granata Emperor resided." - Inscription on the painting.
Array.parchmentDescription: A desperate prayer reached the gods. At the time when the moon set and the sun began to rise, the divine judgment soared above the clouds, shattering the tower of "Babel" where it stood, and fell upon the castle where the Granata Emperor resided." - Inscription on the painting.
Array.clue: A desperate prayer reached the gods. At the time when the moon set and the sun began to rise, the divine judgment soared above the clouds, shattering the tower of "Babel" where it stood, and fell upon the castle where the Granata Emperor resided." - Inscription on the painting.

Array.name: Pyramid
Array.description: A prominent building and symbol in Pira, where vast deserts stretched out. It's a tomb style that was also used in Pityr, the successor state of Pira.
Array.parchmentDescription: A prominent building and symbol in Pira, where vast deserts stretched out. It's a tomb style that was also used in Pityr, the successor state of Pira.
Array.clue: A prominent building and symbol in Pira, where vast deserts stretched out. It's a tomb style that was also used in Pityr, the successor state of Pira.

Array.name: Tophinx
Array.description: A sculpture depicting the legendary divine beast said to have protected Pira. It is portrayed in a peaceful slumber, covered in a blanket.
Array.parchmentDescription: A sculpture depicting the legendary divine beast said to have protected Pira. It is portrayed in a peaceful slumber, covered in a blanket.
Array.clue: A sculpture depicting the legendary divine beast said to have protected Pira. It is portrayed in a peaceful slumber, covered in a blanket.

Array.name: Colosseum
Array.description: A building erected by those who were enthralled with battle. It's said that the people in this building bought the wrath of the gods and were struck with a curse that made them shrink.
Array.parchmentDescription: A building erected by those who were enthralled with battle. It's said that the people in this building bought the wrath of the gods and were struck with a curse that made them shrink.
Array.clue: A building erected by those who were enthralled with battle. It's said that the people in this building bought the wrath of the gods and were struck with a curse that made them shrink.

Array.name: Triumphal Arch
Array.description: The gate created by the king of Opion, who had become the sole empire after victory in war, asserting that all lands ultimately lead to Opion. It was carved from pure white marble in honor of the two creator gods.
Array.parchmentDescription: The gate created by the king of Opion, who had become the sole empire after victory in war, asserting that all lands ultimately lead to Opion. It was carved from pure white marble in honor of the two creator gods.
Array.clue: The gate created by the king of Opion, who had become the sole empire after victory in war, asserting that all lands ultimately lead to Opion. It was carved from pure white marble in honor of the two creator gods.

Array.name: Weeping Statue
Array.description: A statue carved from an unknown type of stone. It depicts someone who is so engulfed in sadness that they cannot lift their head.
Array.parchmentDescription: A statue carved from an unknown type of stone. It depicts someone who is so engulfed in sadness that they cannot lift their head.
Array.clue: A statue carved from an unknown type of stone. It depicts someone who is so engulfed in sadness that they cannot lift their head.

Array.name: Exotic Pottery
Array.description: An uncommonly shaped dish from Parcai. It has an exotic form. This relic is said to have sparked a trend of similar styles.
Array.parchmentDescription: An uncommonly shaped dish from Parcai. It has an exotic form. This relic is said to have sparked a trend of similar styles.
Array.clue: An uncommonly shaped dish from Parcai. It has an exotic form. This relic is said to have sparked a trend of similar styles.

Array.name: Frozen Footsteps
Array.description: A glass-colored shoe. It emits a subtle blue light. It's the last relic of Princess Granisado, who moved with a firm resolve to protect the Frozen Lands.
Array.parchmentDescription: A glass-colored shoe. It emits a subtle blue light. It's the last relic of Princess Granisado, who moved with a firm resolve to protect the Frozen Lands.
Array.clue: A glass-colored shoe. It emits a subtle blue light. It's the last relic of Princess Granisado, who moved with a firm resolve to protect the Frozen Lands.

Array.name: Chalice for the Gods
Array.description: A golden chalice made to celebrate victory. It is said that in Opion, there was a culture where the emperor offered a cup to the gods before starting a war. Therefore, it is said that many sacrifices followed each time this cup was filled.
Array.parchmentDescription: A golden chalice made to celebrate victory. It is said that in Opion, there was a culture where the emperor offered a cup to the gods before starting a war. Therefore, it is said that many sacrifices followed each time this cup was filled.
Array.clue: A golden chalice made to celebrate victory. It is said that in Opion, there was a culture where the emperor offered a cup to the gods before starting a war. Therefore, it is said that many sacrifices followed each time this cup was filled.

Array.name: Elleis
Array.description: A pure white butterfly created jointly by an alchemist and a wizard. After the divine punishment, it was made as a messenger to find the gods who had departed for the divine realm, combining magic that symbolizes the traces of gods and alchemy that symbolizes human reason.
Array.parchmentDescription: A pure white butterfly created jointly by an alchemist and a wizard. After the divine punishment, it was made as a messenger to find the gods who had departed for the divine realm, combining magic that symbolizes the traces of gods and alchemy that symbolizes human reason.
Array.clue: A pure white butterfly created jointly by an alchemist and a wizard. After the divine punishment, it was made as a messenger to find the gods who had departed for the divine realm, combining magic that symbolizes the traces of gods and alchemy that symbolizes human reason.

Array.name: The Scream
Array.description: A portrait depicting someone who was sacrificed to the holy war. "May we find purity. Please lift as we send those burdened with the weight of sin to the great ones." - Extracted from the Prayers of the Paccard Shrine.
Array.parchmentDescription: A portrait depicting someone who was sacrificed to the holy war. "May we find purity. Please lift as we send those burdened with the weight of sin to the great ones." - Extracted from the Prayers of the Paccard Shrine.
Array.clue: A portrait depicting someone who was sacrificed to the holy war. "May we find purity. Please lift as we send those burdened with the weight of sin to the great ones." - Extracted from the Prayers of the Paccard Shrine.

Array.name: The Rabbit Piper
Array.description: A portrait of a rabbit affiliated with the palace orchestra. It is said that they lived their life dedicated to music, delighting the god of music with their performances.
Array.parchmentDescription: A portrait of a rabbit affiliated with the palace orchestra. It is said that they lived their life dedicated to music, delighting the god of music with their performances.
Array.clue: A portrait of a rabbit affiliated with the palace orchestra. It is said that they lived their life dedicated to music, delighting the god of music with their performances.

Array.name: The Gleaning Fairy
Array.description: A picture filled with warm affection. It depicts fairies joyfully gathering grains in the midst of abundant nature.
Array.parchmentDescription: A picture filled with warm affection. It depicts fairies joyfully gathering grains in the midst of abundant nature.
Array.clue: A picture filled with warm affection. It depicts fairies joyfully gathering grains in the midst of abundant nature.

Array.name: The Freedom Leading the Masses
Array.description: A painting drawn after the uprising against the cruel rule of 'Geras', the ruler of the Erebus continent. Although the revolution failed, it is said to express the longing for freedom that exists in people's hearts.
Array.parchmentDescription: A painting drawn after the uprising against the cruel rule of 'Geras', the ruler of the Erebus continent. Although the revolution failed, it is said to express the longing for freedom that exists in people's hearts.
Array.clue: A painting drawn after the uprising against the cruel rule of 'Geras', the ruler of the Erebus continent. Although the revolution failed, it is said to express the longing for freedom that exists in people's hearts.

Array.name: Golden Apple
Array.description: The last relic left by the one who chose faith before the gods. It's written, "To the most beautiful one."
Array.parchmentDescription: The last relic left by the one who chose faith before the gods. It's written, "To the most beautiful one."
Array.clue: The last relic left by the one who chose faith before the gods. It's written, "To the most beautiful one."

Array.name: Statue of Liberty
Array.description: A statue carved in the image of the goddess who brought freedom to the marginalized races. The ears that rise above her head are a symbol of the rabbit who carved this statue.
Array.parchmentDescription: A statue carved in the image of the goddess who brought freedom to the marginalized races. The ears that rise above her head are a symbol of the rabbit who carved this statue.
Array.clue: A statue carved in the image of the goddess who brought freedom to the marginalized races. The ears that rise above her head are a symbol of the rabbit who carved this statue.

Array.name: Golden Lamp
Array.description: A peculiar lamp inhabited by a spirit. It is recorded that if you meet the spirit inside the lamp, it will grant your wish.
Array.parchmentDescription: A peculiar lamp inhabited by a spirit. It is recorded that if you meet the spirit inside the lamp, it will grant your wish.
Array.clue: A peculiar lamp inhabited by a spirit. It is recorded that if you meet the spirit inside the lamp, it will grant your wish.

Array.name: Tower of Pion
Array.description: A leaning tower in a region called Pion. At the highest point of the tower, there was a bell symbolizing balance, but one day it suddenly disappeared. It is said that the tower has been leaning ever since the bell disappeared.
Array.parchmentDescription: A leaning tower in a region called Pion. At the highest point of the tower, there was a bell symbolizing balance, but one day it suddenly disappeared. It is said that the tower has been leaning ever since the bell disappeared.
Array.clue: A leaning tower in a region called Pion. At the highest point of the tower, there was a bell symbolizing balance, but one day it suddenly disappeared. It is said that the tower has been leaning ever since the bell disappeared.

Array.name: Dike, the Goddess of Harmony
Array.description: A portrait of the last god who loved people and pitied them. Who will look after them now?
Array.parchmentDescription: A portrait of the last god who loved people and pitied them. Who will look after them now?
Array.clue: A portrait of the last god who loved people and pitied them. Who will look after them now?

Array.name: Starry Night
Array.description: The forbidden tower where the great wizard Dean resides. What are the brightly shining stars and moon in the dark night sky watching over?
Array.parchmentDescription: The forbidden tower where the great wizard Dean resides. What are the brightly shining stars and moon in the dark night sky watching over?
Array.clue: The forbidden tower where the great wizard Dean resides. What are the brightly shining stars and moon in the dark night sky watching over?

Array.name: Harp of Abundance
Array.description: A harp adorned with flowers symbolizing each growing season of life. It is said that when you start playing, you see a landscape so enchanting it's unbelievable.
Array.parchmentDescription: A harp adorned with flowers symbolizing each growing season of life. It is said that when you start playing, you see a landscape so enchanting it's unbelievable.
Array.clue: A harp adorned with flowers symbolizing each growing season of life. It is said that when you start playing, you see a landscape so enchanting it's unbelievable.

Array.name: Scroll of Promise
Array.description: A document recording the pact shared between the god of water, Neun, and humans. It contains the stipulation, "Do not let anything impure flow into the water," which was a rule to be strictly followed when teaching water magic to people.
Array.parchmentDescription: A document recording the pact shared between the god of water, Neun, and humans. It contains the stipulation, "Do not let anything impure flow into the water," which was a rule to be strictly followed when teaching water magic to people.
Array.clue: A document recording the pact shared between the god of water, Neun, and humans. It contains the stipulation, "Do not let anything impure flow into the water," which was a rule to be strictly followed when teaching water magic to people.

Array.name: Shield of Lu Valin
Array.description: A shield believed to be a holy relic of the God of the Sun, Sol. It is said that the person who wields this shield gains honor.
Array.parchmentDescription: A shield believed to be a holy relic of the God of the Sun, Sol. It is said that the person who wields this shield gains honor.
Array.clue: A shield believed to be a holy relic of the God of the Sun, Sol. It is said that the person who wields this shield gains honor.

Array.name: Portrait of Ishirtari
Array.description: A portrait of Ishtari, the queen of Nener II. She is depicted in sorrow due to the disaster that befell Pira.
Array.parchmentDescription: A portrait of Ishtari, the queen of Nener II. She is depicted in sorrow due to the disaster that befell Pira.
Array.clue: A portrait of Ishtari, the queen of Nener II. She is depicted in sorrow due to the disaster that befell Pira.

Array.name: Woman with a Parasol
Array.description: A portrait of a rabbit approaching a painter blinded by sunlight. It is said that when the rabbit covered him with a parasol, the painter's eyes opened again.
Array.parchmentDescription: A portrait of a rabbit approaching a painter blinded by sunlight. It is said that when the rabbit covered him with a parasol, the painter's eyes opened again.
Array.clue: A portrait of a rabbit approaching a painter blinded by sunlight. It is said that when the rabbit covered him with a parasol, the painter's eyes opened again.

Array.name: Wounded Tear Crystal
Array.description: A crystallization of emotion formed from an endless outpouring of sorrow from a wounded heart. The depth of this pain is something no one can truly comprehend.
Array.parchmentDescription: A crystallization of emotion formed from an endless outpouring of sorrow from a wounded heart. The depth of this pain is something no one can truly comprehend.
Array.clue: A crystallization of emotion formed from an endless outpouring of sorrow from a wounded heart. The depth of this pain is something no one can truly comprehend.

Array.name: Everlasting Frozen Heart
Array.description: An ice heart that feels cold with the ruthlessness of time at just a touch. This lengthy solitude will never, ever melt away.
Array.parchmentDescription: An ice heart that feels cold with the ruthlessness of time at just a touch. This lengthy solitude will never, ever melt away.
Array.clue: An ice heart that feels cold with the ruthlessness of time at just a touch. This lengthy solitude will never, ever melt away.

Array.name: Golden Mirror Reflecting Sincerity
Array.description: A mirror that only reflects the true heart of the viewer. But what this mirror reflects is love, showing only what is loved.
Array.parchmentDescription: A mirror that only reflects the true heart of the viewer. But what this mirror reflects is love, showing only what is loved.
Array.clue: A mirror that only reflects the true heart of the viewer. But what this mirror reflects is love, showing only what is loved.

Array.name: Faithful Laurel Wreath of the Greenery
Array.description: A laurel wreath that guides you towards a warm ideal. It is woven together with the gentle wind, the affectionate sunlight, and the rustling sound of the waving green.

Array.name: Royal Palace Wizard Medal
Array.description: Medal awarded by the Princess of Granisado. Wizards with this medal were called "Wizards of the Blue Spring."

Array.name: Hymn of Loyalty
Array.description: A tribute song for the loyal subjects of Granisado. Its sad yet beautiful melody plays the hopes of spring.

Array.name: Cactus Juice Jar
Array.description: A jar of cactus juice. It holds the memory of a craftsman who made the sweetest juice in the desert region.
Array.parchmentDescription: A jar of cactus juice. It holds the memory of a craftsman who made the sweetest juice in the desert region.

Array.name: Pipi's Blanket
Array.description: A blanket filled with warm feelings for a little rabbit. Even the sunlight feels cozy under this blanket.
Array.parchmentDescription: A blanket filled with warm feelings for a little rabbit. Even the sunlight feels cozy under this blanket.
Array.clue: A blanket filled with warm feelings for a little rabbit. Even the sunlight feels cozy under this blanket.

Array.name: Golden Tears
Array.description: Gold discovered amidst the disaster in the Lukuma region. Holding it brings a sense of deep sorrow.
Array.parchmentDescription: Gold discovered amidst the disaster in the Lukuma region. Holding it brings a sense of deep sorrow.
Array.clue: Gold discovered amidst the disaster in the Lukuma region. Holding it brings a sense of deep sorrow.

Array.name: Happy Fairy in the Forest
Array.description: A statue carved with a fairy smiling brightly. It seems to show the happy times when fairies were together in the forest.
Array.parchmentDescription: A statue carved with a fairy smiling brightly. It seems to show the happy times when fairies were together in the forest.
Array.clue: A statue carved with a fairy smiling brightly. It seems to show the happy times when fairies were together in the forest.

Array.name: Castle of Geras
Array.description: A painting by a scholar who had deep anguish amid the pain of war. This work, depicting a disconnected world, has various interpretations.
Array.parchmentDescription: A painting by a scholar who had deep anguish amid the pain of war. This work, depicting a disconnected world, has various interpretations.
Array.clue: A painting by a scholar who had deep anguish amid the pain of war. This work, depicting a disconnected world, has various interpretations.

Array.name: Pottery of Fruits
Array.description: A trace of ancient civilization. An object that embodies the aesthetics created after the birth of the goddess of spring and beauty.
Array.parchmentDescription: A trace of ancient civilization. An object that embodies the aesthetics created after the birth of the goddess of spring and beauty.
Array.clue: A trace of ancient civilization. An object that embodies the aesthetics created after the birth of the goddess of spring and beauty.

Array.name: Ophion Bronze Helmet
Array.description: A helmet offered to the gods for victory in war. However, the gods did not take the offering.
Array.parchmentDescription: A helmet offered to the gods for victory in war. However, the gods did not take the offering.
Array.clue: A helmet offered to the gods for victory in war. However, the gods did not take the offering.

Array.name: Statue of Amalthea
Array.description: A statue of a compassionate god symbolizing endless mercy. Born under the god of night, it was meant to protect people but was forgotten after sacrificing itself and disappearing.
Array.parchmentDescription: A statue of a compassionate god symbolizing endless mercy. Born under the god of night, it was meant to protect people but was forgotten after sacrificing itself and disappearing.
Array.clue: A statue of a compassionate god symbolizing endless mercy. Born under the god of night, it was meant to protect people but was forgotten after sacrificing itself and disappearing.

Array.name: Tower of Bones
Array.description: Created from the architect's ingenious idea, it was destroyed because people at the time thought it looked like bones. The original name of the tower before its destruction is not recorded.
Array.parchmentDescription: Created from the architect's ingenious idea, it was destroyed because people at the time thought it looked like bones. The original name of the tower before its destruction is not recorded.
Array.clue: Created from the architect's ingenious idea, it was destroyed because people at the time thought it looked like bones. The original name of the tower before its destruction is not recorded.

Array.name: Topora Pottery
Array.description: A unique type of vessel made and used by skilled craft rabbits. This style became widespread as the rabbits who served the gods created items for the temple.
Array.parchmentDescription: A unique type of vessel made and used by skilled craft rabbits. This style became widespread as the rabbits who served the gods created items for the temple.
Array.clue: A unique type of vessel made and used by skilled craft rabbits. This style became widespread as the rabbits who served the gods created items for the temple.

Array.name: Trojan Horse
Array.description: Fairies bringing a rocking horse into the temple to entertain the goddess, who finds every day boring. I wonder where they found this horse?
Array.parchmentDescription: Fairies bringing a rocking horse into the temple to entertain the goddess, who finds every day boring. I wonder where they found this horse?
Array.clue: Fairies bringing a rocking horse into the temple to entertain the goddess, who finds every day boring. I wonder where they found this horse?

Array.name: Crystal of the Seasons
Array.description: A crystal sphere of the seasons containing all four quarters. Inside the crystal, a long-awaited spring is gently blooming.
Array.parchmentDescription: A crystal sphere of the seasons containing all four quarters. Inside the crystal, a long-awaited spring is gently blooming.
Array.clue: A crystal sphere of the seasons containing all four quarters. Inside the crystal, a long-awaited spring is gently blooming.

Array.name: Chalice of Water
Array.description: The chalice that was kept in the Water Shrine. It's believed to be a gift directly from the God of Water, Neun, to humans.
Array.parchmentDescription: The chalice that was kept in the Water Shrine. It's believed to be a gift directly from the God of Water, Neun, to humans.
Array.clue: The chalice that was kept in the Water Shrine. It's believed to be a gift directly from the God of Water, Neun, to humans.

Array.name: Witch's Spinning Wheel
Array.description: A spinning wheel given as a gift by a witch who cursed someone in the past. There's a tale that if you prick yourself on the wheel, you fall asleep.
Array.parchmentDescription: A spinning wheel given as a gift by a witch who cursed someone in the past. There's a tale that if you prick yourself on the wheel, you fall asleep.
Array.clue: A spinning wheel given as a gift by a witch who cursed someone in the past. There's a tale that if you prick yourself on the wheel, you fall asleep.

Array.name: Rabbit on a Swing
Array.description: A piece that depicts the romance of a peaceful era. This painting, featuring various races smiling, showcases the abundant landscapes of a bygone time.
